China expands amphibious forces in challenge to US beyond Asia tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-747719 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/world/747719/china-expands-amphibious-forces-in-challenge-to-us-beyond-asia/story/ China launched its military build-up in the mid-1990s with a top priority: keep the United States at bay in any conflict by making the waters off the Chinese coast a death trap. Nobya ni Jang Lucero, iginiit na walang siyang alam sa krimen; NBI, pasok na rin sa kaso tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-747714 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/ulatfilipino/747714/nobya-ni-jang-lucero-iginiit-na-walang-siyang-alam-sa-krimen-nbi-pasok-na-rin-sa-kaso/story/ Nais ng pamilya ng babaeng driver na si Jang Lucero na imbestigahan ang kaniyang nobyang si Meyah Amatorio para alamin kung sangkot siya sa karumal-dumal na krimen, bagay na itinanggi ng huli. Close to 840,000 kids to get anti-polio vaccine in BARMM amid COVID-19 pandemic tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-747712 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/regions/747712/close-to-840-000-kids-to-get-anti-polio-vaccine-in-barmm-amid-covid-19-pandemic/story/ The Bangsamoro Ministry of Health said the nationwide synchronized polio vaccination campaign “Sabayang Patak Kontra Polio,” which will be from July 20 to August 20, will be conducted among 839,677 children in the provinces of Maguindanao, Lanao del Sur, Basilan, Sulu and Tawi-Tawi.
